announce.description: Changes the way Stereo announces new songs

args.enabled: If announcing should be enabled or not
args.delete: If old announcements should be deleted or not

announce.success: >>> {emoji.greentick} | Song announcements are now **{announce}**, deleting old announcements are now **{deleteAnnounce}**!

defaultvol.description: Changes the default volume for this server

args.value: The value the default volume has to change to

defaultvol.fail: >>> {emoji.redcross} | The provided value must be between 1 and 200!
